citation.case_name: Seismograph Service Corp. v. Noel Monaghan, Chairman, State Tax Commission

html:
361 U.S. 35

80 S.Ct. 137

4 L.Ed.2d 111

SEISMOGRAPH SERVICE CORP.
v.
Noel MONAGHAN, Chairman, State Tax Commission.

No. 265.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 26, 1959

Mr. Donald C. Beelar, for appellant.

Mr. John E. Stone, for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed. Treating the papers whereon the appeal was taken as a petition for writ of certiorari, certiorari is denied.
